name: MC 1.15 and WorldGuard
body:
* Updated to minecraft 1.15
* Restored WorldGuard support

name: v3.1.0 - New loggers & ac
body:
Added support for new loggers and access controller.

Supported loggers:
* CoreProtect
* LogBlock

Supported block access controllers:
* Factions
* GriefPrevention

name: v3.0.0 - Spigot 1.13
body:
This build adds proper support for 1.13. The API was also changed therefore if you are using it in your plugins please update.

As I stated in my message I removed most of the loggers and access controllers. Currently BlocksHub supports:

Supported loggers:
* CoreProtect

Supported block access controllers:
* Factions

Support for additional plugins will be added in the future releases. If you need support for a specific plugin drop me a message!

name: v2.1.1
body: Add support for residence API v4.6

name: v2.1.0
body:
- Fixed prism logging
- update HawkEye API
- update Residence API
- added option to disable bridges
- added support for precious stones.

name: v2.0
body:
Changes:
- new API version v2.0 (not compatible with v1.x)
- merge all to one jar
- updated bridge plugins to latest versions
- prepared the whole plugin to work on more then one platform

name: BlocksHub v1.2.1
body: Updated CoreProtect integration to newest version.

name: BlocksHub v1.2
body:
Added support for:
- Towny
- Factions

Fixed LogBlock integration
Removed GriefPrevention 7x support

name: BlocksHub v1.0
body:
Changes:
- new license
- new API
- extracted each blocks logger to separate plugin
- extracted each blocks access controller to separate plugni

name: BlocksHub v0.5
body:
Changes:
- Minor code refactoring for access controllers
- Added GriefPrevention

name: BlocksHub v0.4
body:
Changes:
- updated to new bukkit API
- added Residence access control checker

name: BlocksHub v0.3
body:
Changes:
- Added support for Prism 2.x API
- Added Prism version detection
